title: Having progressively worse problems getting game to load after champ select.
body:
Hey all, I've been having a consistent problem for a minute getting LOL to run after champ select.

I get the League splash screen, the screen goes black, then nothing. I don't make it to the load screen at all. I can use task manager to end and reconnect over and over again and it used to work eventually after 4-8 tries, but now it's so bad I've been placed in a lower queue for leaving/AFK. I've shut off my firewall, allowed all client processes, and run as administrator, nada.

Running Windows 8.1 and my directx is up to date.

I'd appreciate any help folks can give, thanks.

-H

replies.body:
It sounds like your connection to the gameservers is pretty poor, which could prevent a full connection from being established. Most of the time, this is caused by certain network settings that conflict with League. I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as it covers the most common solutions for this issue.

Let me know if those steps helped.
